Toledo.Wildwood Preserve Metropark:
Wildwood Preserve Metropark is a nature reserve located in Toledo, Ohio, near Sylvania, that is part of the Toledo Metroparks. Previously, the park was a family estate of Robert A. Stranahan, Senior, and, in the 1970s, both the estate and the home were bought by the Metroparks.


== Wildwood Manor House ==
Built in 1938, the Wildwood Manor House was the home of the original owners, the Stranahans.
